pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+, 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 @ 3.2 GHz (2-core)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11.0
